definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: She seldom, if ever, paints or powders.
Beauty-conscious women have been powdering their skin since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 自古以來，嚮往追求美麗的女人都喜歡塗脂抹粉。

sentences.english: Berlusconi appeared before each time, something must be careful to whitewash it.
sentences.chinese: 老貝每次亮相前，都要細心地塗脂抹粉一番呢。

sentences.english: The other women paint in order to try and look young.
sentences.chinese: 另一種女人塗脂抹粉，儘量顯得年輕些。
